com.facebook.buck.model

Class BuildTargets

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.model.BuildTargets

  • public class BuildTargets
extends java.lang.Object
    Static helpers for working with build targets.

    • Method Detail

      • getScratchPath

        public static java.nio.file.Path getScratchPath(BuildTarget target,
                                java.lang.String format)
        Return a path to a file in the buck-out/bin/ directory. format will be prepended with the BuckConstant.SCRATCH_DIR and the target base path, then formatted with the target short name.
        Parameters:
        target - The BuildTarget to scope this path to.
        format - String.format(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...) string for the path name. It should contain one "%s", which will be filled in with the rule's short name. It should not start with a slash.
        Returns:
        A Path under buck-out/bin, scoped to the base path of target.

      • getGenPath

        public static java.nio.file.Path getGenPath(BuildTarget target,
                            java.lang.String format)
        Return a path to a file in the buck-out/gen/ directory. format will be prepended with the BuckConstant.GEN_DIR and the target base path, then formatted with the target short name.
        Parameters:
        target - The BuildTarget to scope this path to.
        format - String.format(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...) string for the path name. It should contain one "%s", which will be filled in with the rule's short name. It should not start with a slash.
        Returns:
        A Path under buck-out/gen, scoped to the base path of target.

      • createFlavoredBuildTarget

        public static BuildTarget createFlavoredBuildTarget(UnflavoredBuildTarget buildTarget,
                                    Flavor flavor)
        Takes the BuildTarget for hasBuildTarget and derives a new BuildTarget from it with the specified flavor.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the original BuildTarget already has a flavor.

      • isVisibleTo

        public static boolean isVisibleTo(BuildTarget target,
                  ImmutableSet<BuildTargetPattern> visibilityPatterns,
                  BuildTarget other)
        Returns whether the BuildTarget `target` is visible to the BuildTarget `other` using the given visibility patterns.

        Propagate flavors represented by the given FlavorDomain objects from a parent target to its dependencies.
